item.description:
At the second get together we all put book ideas in Annie's hat and randomly picked.. Bel Canto, by Ann Patchett. So, er, join us at PANERA in Hadley on Monday, May 4, at 7 to talk about it!

****Place changed to PANERA! ****


Sorry for all the changes! We got conflicting information from the Fitzwilly's staff, but the last person we talked to said the upstairs area is closed on Mondays and could only be reserved if everyone was going to be eating

SO.. Panera on Route 9 in Hadley it is - apologies for the confusion. Hopefully it is convenient for folks. There is a google map here



***

On a slightly unrelated note: If you'd like to stay involved/ continue to hear about upcoming book group get togethers (even if you haven't been able to make one so far!) please sign up for the google group if you haven't already.

Meetup is swell, but sadly there's a catch - it's $19 or so every month, while the google group is free, and we don't want to have to charge dues for the group. So, I will be deleting this meetup group at the beginning of next month.

To sign up for the google group just send an email with a couple of sentences (to prove you aren't spam) to westernmassbookgroup(at)googlegroups(dot)com.

Alternatively, you can message me via meetup or email me at newbookgroup@gmail.com and I will make sure to manually add you to the "westernmassbookgroup" list.

****

By the way, if anyone feels really super strongly that we should keep this meetup group and wants to pay for the next month, send me an email today and I can make you organizer (this means you'll be responsible for the next $19.00.)

Look forward to seeing everyone again soon :)
item.name: 3rd meetup - book: "Bel Canto" by Ann Patchett
